level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-209, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-451.

level.heading: Effective Dates
level.text: Section 601(b) of D.C. Law 6-209 provided that title III and sections 401, 402, 404, 405 and 406 of the act shall take effect on October 1, 1987.

level.heading: Miscellaneous Notes
level.text: Section 410(d) of D.C. Law 13-305 provides: "Section 406(a), (c), (j), (m), (p), (q), (s), (w), (bb), (dd), (ee), (hh) through (kk), (mm) through (oo), (qq) through (uu), (yy), (zz), (bbb), (ddd), and (fff) shall apply for all tax years or taxable periods beginning after December 31, 2000."
